name: Say Goodbye - The Requiem
description:
The full release of this game is now out! Featuring new win conditions for both the monster and the player.

THIS GAME DOES FEATURE IN BUILT VC. We didn't figure out how to give you the option to turn it off so just be prepared.

You need friends to play this game (or just get random people heh)

There's a monster, and the rest of the people are players. Thing is, the room is too dark to see anyone. Navigate by sound and have fun :) The players can sense the monster's movement, but the monster can only hear vague footsteps. The players win by collecting every orb on the map, whereas the monster wins by catching all players.

Controls

To start a match, either create/join rooms with specific room names or join a random existing room using Quick Play. The room host is designated as the hunter.

W, A, S, D (or equivalent controls on controllers) to move

...and that's all you need to know :)

Credit to Rick Astley for giving us some of our essential assets!
